comment: Loved Prof K! She's super understanding, and as she says, she cares about your grade if you show that you care about your grade. You're able to exempt the final if you have a 95% overall and I easily managed a 97. As long as you show up to class and take half decent notes, you'll be fine!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Kara Heller is the best professor. I suck at math and she made this class so easy for me. She truly cares about you and made me want to come to class every time and it was actually fun. She sees you as a person and is very relatable, if you ever need anything she is there to help. I cant stress this enough, please take her it will be the best class

Kara Heller is truly the best professor ive had and will ever have. This class is easy, you care about your grade, the she will care about your grade. She cares about you as a person and your mental health she doesnt see you just a random college student. There are ALEKS hw assignments and 3 test dont worry. She will help you with any/everything

The best professor I have ever had hands down. I have never actually felt like one of my professors truly cared about my personal success until her. A few weeks in to the semester she knew every single one of our names and would say them while we walked into class. I would take any class she offered.

Kara Heller was an ok professor. She was new at her job, and was ver caring. But when it came to the homework, it was ridiculous! It felt like it was doing homework at home 4 days a week, roughly an hour a day. The final review had 47 questions, but not even half on the actual final. Poor way of doing things that was unfair for the students.

She was new, however it felt like she leaned on us and we leaned on her. She's very sweet and personable. She's young so it's very easy to relate to her. Assignments are done on Alecs. She provides all necessary material you need, and the videos on Alecs help ALOT so watch them. If you have 95 or above your exempted from the final exam.
Kata Heller is an awesome professor. She clearly cares about your grade if you do. Just put in the effort and you will pass.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Caring--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She is such a laid back professor. If you pay attention and do the homework, you will get an A in the class. She will pass you if you look like you care. She is amazing!

Professor Heller is the greatest professor I have ever had! Shes very easy to understand, and she cares a lot about her students. Shes very personable, and makes everyone feel like they matter! She makes sure you are more than prepared for all of her tests and quizzes, and provides plenty of extra credit opportunities!
